list.name: AMBUSH
list.description: Piper's attack deals +x extra damage (at max range) when she's hidden in a bush.
list.descriptionHtml: Piper's attack deals +x extra damage (at max range) when she's hidden in a bush.

list.name: SNAPPY-SNIPING
list.description: When Piper hits an opponent with her attack, she reloads x ammo instantly.
list.descriptionHtml: When Piper hits an opponent with her attack, she reloads x ammo instantly.
